results.content:
Rich is a super teacher. He explained everything very good. The course is motivating and the excercises are apropriate for the particular subject without being boring. 
I learned a lot and the learning speed in the course is excellent. Rich has chosen a perfect depth of the new skills he explained in every section. There is never too less or the too much.
I came from another course that i did not end, because the practices did not fit me, it was to boring. But different people are for different courses. Give Rich a try. It is worth it.
Now i have to begin part 2. Im looking forward to this.

[sorry for mistakes in this text. im not in english native speaker :) ]

results.content: Other teachers have made me feel not good enough for making mistakes or for not falling in line with precise instructions immediately. Rich makes me feel like I'm okay to make mistakes and my modest beginnings are good enough for a start.
results.content_html: Other teachers have made me feel not good enough for making mistakes or for not falling in line with precise instructions immediately. Rich makes me feel like I'm okay to make mistakes and my modest beginnings are good enough for a start.

results.content: Me pareció muy entretenido, enseña muchas cosas básicas y tiene muchos ejercicios que son muy entretenidos para practicar
results.content_html: Me pareció muy entretenido, enseña muchas cosas básicas y tiene muchos ejercicios que son muy entretenidos para practicar

results.content: great for the beginner with detailed easy explanations and plenty of opportunity to practice the exercises
results.content_html: great for the beginner with detailed easy explanations and plenty of opportunity to practice the exercises

results.content: I am pleased with this course. It was exactly what I have been looking for and exactly what I was told it would be. I liked it very much and I'm looking forward to the next courses and learn more about drawing!
results.content_html: I am pleased with this course. It was exactly what I have been looking for and exactly what I was told it would be. I liked it very much and I'm looking forward to the next courses and learn more about drawing!

results.content:
I'd prefer more structure in lectures. Sometimes I had a feeling that instructor doesn't know what he is going to talk about. And there times when the teacher is like "oh, look, I made a mistake, ha-ha, you see I can make mistakes too". It's fine first 2-3 times, but then it just becomes annoying.
But I guess that for some people his style of teaching is more suitable.
results.content_html:
I'd prefer more structure in lectures. Sometimes I had a feeling that instructor doesn't know what he is going to talk about. And there times when the teacher is like "oh, look, I made a mistake, ha-ha, you see I can make mistakes too". It's fine first 2-3 times, but then it just becomes annoying.
But I guess that for some people his style of teaching is more suitable.

results.content: I never had a good art teacher in my whole life. I love the foundations provided in this course, pretty helpful. Thanks!
results.content_html: I never had a good art teacher in my whole life. I love the foundations provided in this course, pretty helpful. Thanks!

results.content: Very useful for beginners, easy to follow and understand the lessons in simple explanations for those who feel intimidated by drawing but would like to hone their skills and become better artists right from start. Enough opportunities to practise sketching and drawing lines, basic forms and organic shapes. This course really makes you comfortable as a total beginner to improve your skills from zero. You build confidence with simplicity. I needed this course as a total beginner and I'm really happy to have signed up for it.
results.content_html: Very useful for beginners, easy to follow and understand the lessons in simple explanations for those who feel intimidated by drawing but would like to hone their skills and become better artists right from start. Enough opportunities to practise sketching and drawing lines, basic forms and organic shapes. This course really makes you comfortable as a total beginner to improve your skills from zero. You build confidence with simplicity. I needed this course as a total beginner and I'm really happy to have signed up for it.

results.content: I have learned so much from the instructor in a linear way where I can really track progress. This is exactly what I was looking for as an adult with no drawing skills but a desire to improve!
results.content_html: I have learned so much from the instructor in a linear way where I can really track progress. This is exactly what I was looking for as an adult with no drawing skills but a desire to improve!

results.content: Very friendly for beginners :), the instructor is awesome and a great motivator as well.
results.content_html: Very friendly for beginners :), the instructor is awesome and a great motivator as well.

results.content: I was expecting more information with real time drawing and not using digital tools to teach.The instructor says it’s a traditional course but doesn’t use any traditional tool to demonstrate any assignment.The section on shadow doesn’t explain anything else other than caste shadow.There we’re so many unsatisfactory moments through the lessons, not worthy of my time and money.I am sorry that I spend my money on this course.Too much waste of time………
